channel.title: beginner on Alexander C. Hungerford
channel.description: Recent content in beginner on Alexander C. Hungerford

item.title: Columns & Rows: select, filter, mutate
item.description: OBJECTIVE: Demonstrate how to create and manipulate data with R and the Tidyverse using data from my fantasy football league. Add columns and change values with mutate() Choose columns with select() Choose rows with filter() Manipulate data with pivot_longer() & pivot_wider() Setup library(tidyverse) ## -- Attaching packages --------------------------------------- tidyverse 1.3.0 -- ## v ggplot2 3.3.2 v purrr 0.3.4 ## v tibble 3.0.4 v dplyr 1.0.2 ## v tidyr 1.
